https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/f7lzr34UWUoOIfHZh4rKJw7Vl7j.jpg In a moment of anger in a grocery store in Lausanne, a father loses patience and disciplines his disobedient child. A shocked customer immediately intervenes to express her concern. Other customers join the conversation and the discussion soon turns into a debate that gradually gets out of hand. Discipline
